flavorText:
"Teach by example. If your students do not survive, they were not worth the lesson."
—General Varchild

foreignData.name: Stimme des Veteranen
foreignData.text:
Sprich diese Verzauberung auf eine Kreatur, die Du beherrschst.
{0}: Tappe die verzauberte Kreatur, um einer anderen Kreatur Deiner Wahl +2/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges zu geben.

name: Veteran's Voice
originalText:
Play on a creature you control.
o0: Tap enchanted creature to give any other target creature +2/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Is put into its owner’s graveyard if you lose control of the creature.

text:
Enchant creature you control
Tap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if enchanted creature is untapped.
